meanings.definition: The state or quality of being hispid.
meanings.sent1: The hispidity of the cactus made it difficult to touch.
meanings.sent2: The hispidity of the cat's fur gave it a rough texture.
meanings.sent3: The hispidity of the hedgehog's spines made it look like a tiny porcupine.
meanings.sent4: The hispidity of the brush resembled a bed of thorns.
meanings.sent5: The hispidity of the plant was so prickly that it deterred animals from grazing on it.

meanings.definition: The presence of stiff hairs or bristles.
meanings.sent1: She avoided the hispidity of the brush to prevent scratches.
meanings.sent2: The hispidity of the porcupine's quills served as a defense mechanism.
meanings.sent3: The hispidity of the broom made sweeping the floor a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The hispidity of the thorns on the rose bush caught her attention.
meanings.sent5: The hispidity of the caterpillar's hairs warned predators of its potential danger.
